basics.name: Gaurav Manglani
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Backend Developer with robust experience in building scalable software solutions and a strong foundation in computer science. Committed to improving system performance and enhancing user experiences through innovative technology.

work.name: Cisco
work.summary: Designed and architected multiple high-availability, customer-facing services to enhance user experience and scalability.
highlights: Led implementation efforts employing agile methodologies delivering robust and efficient code solutions.
Collaborated cross-functionally with product managers and UX/UI designers to ensure seamless integration of features.
Deployed services using CI/CD pipelines ensuring reliable and rapid releases.
Resolved complex technical issues, optimizing performance and maintaining service uptime.

work.name: Conductor
work.summary: Independently developed an ML-driven solution to replace the existing SERP parser, providing insights into client rankings.
highlights: Extensively used Java, Spark, and Spring Boot for data extraction and model training.
The project's success led to its integration into Conductor's primary architecture.

projects.name: USC Compiler
projects.description: Developed a simplified version of C with a working Lexical Analyzer, Parser, and Code Translator using C++ and LLVM.

projects.name: MyShell
projects.description: Created a UNIX bash shell replica, implementing features such as I/O redirection and built-in functions using C/C++.
